::Zardus::

Zardus shakes his head. "The alliance is neither predicon nor maximal. We 
have renegade members of both. As for the leaders, Liono is the maximal 
leader. He is an incompetent fool. Hell Beast and Megatron, the predacon 
leaders, are fairly intellegent."
